div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta In pretorio pen vltimo die Junij anno
quo supra

the saide day the balyeis ordanit henry orvm officiar' to distrenye
to thomas mar' becaus' he comperit nocht to ansuer' to the borghe'
Strekit one him be Canny ancroft for the Relevin of hir'
of ane boyt and lat it to borghe gif it be askit and warnit
him to comper one friday to ansuer' to the said borghe

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio
die Julij quo supra

div.head: Nomina Inquisicionis in deservicione breuis Inquisicionis Alexandri rolland'
div.p:
Robertus blinsele Alexander rede Johannes Wormet Robertus crage Willelmus
andirsone senior Andreas Cullan senior thomas mar' thomas Waus
Alexander chamer in Schipraw patricius Rede georgius byssat
Andreas Waus Alexander chamer in Schipraw patricius Rede
Patricius leslie Alexander nachtj et Johannes chapman Jurati
dicunt quod quondam thomas Rollande burgensis dicti burgi auus Alexandri
Rolland latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo
ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra penitus
vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter quandam aliam terram olim ipsius olim thome ex australi
ex vna et terram quondam Duncani patirson' ex boriali partibus ab altera
et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens Et de vno
annuo Redditu decim solidorum monete scocie annuatim leuand' de terra
olim thome litstar' Jacente in eodem vico ex occidentali parte eiusdem
Vici inter terram Eduardi top ex australi ex vna et terram Alexandri
gray ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dictus Alexander est vnus de dictis
legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam thome auj suj de terra
et annuo Redditu cum suis pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta
terra est penitus vasta et nullam firmam reddit Et quod dictus annuus
Redditus valet patet in se et valet decim s' per annum et valuit
tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in Capite de Suppremo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existunt
in manibus domini nostri regis per quinque aut Sext annos aut
eocirca ab decessum dicti thome in defectu heredum legittimorum Jus
suum minime prosequentis

Iidem burgenses Jurati dicunt quo quondam thomas Rolland burgensis
dicti burgi auus Alexandri rolland Elene heruy latricis presencium obiit
vltimo vestita et sasitaThe 'us' mark has been changed into an 'a' by rubbing out the descender. ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri Regis de quadam terra penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter quandam aliam terram
olim ipsius thome ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Duncanj
patersone ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus
oriens et occidens Et de vno annuo Redditu decim s' annuatim
leuand' de terra quondam thome litstar' Jacente in eodem vico ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Eduardi top ex australi ex vna et
terram Alexandri gray ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dicta Elena est
vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicti quondam thome auj suj de
dictis terra et annuo Redditu cum suis pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra est penitus vasta et nullam firmam reddit Et
quod dictus annuus redditus patet in se et valet decim solidos per annum et valuit
tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in Capite de Suppremo domino nostro
Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existunt in manibus domini
nostri Regis per quinque annos aut eocirca ab decessum dicti thome
In defectu legittimorum heredum Jus suum minime prosequentis

The saide day thomas Skinnar' was in ane amerciament of the court be
ane Suorne assis' thomas mar' forspekar for the strubulance of the
relict of Richerd of Cullan

The saide day the baillieis assignit this day xv dais to Alexander
bonatmakar to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be
masone anent the vpmakin and bigin of

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto vjo
die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame Wormet Schew that he had nocht gottyn'
the Copy of the borghe' Strekit one him be thomas mar' tharfor
he protestit Solemptlie to haue the copy of the said borghe
and ane lauchfule day to ansuer tharto

the saide day Alexander Sanquhar' lauchfullie Callit and nocht comperit to
ansuer' to the borghe strekit one him be Jonhne talyour' for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of his part of xxtj merkis et cetera tharfor the
balyeis chargit henry orvm to pas' and tak ane distres' fra the
said Alexander and lat It to borghe agan and It be askit and warne
the saide Alexander to comper this day xv dais to ansuer' to the said
borghe as thride day of proces'

The saide day thomas mar' grantit him avand to nicholes noble'
merchand of Deipe iiijor frankis eftir the tenor' of his hand writ
quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law
And gilbert menyeis grantit to releyve the said thomas of his
part of the said four' frankis safar' as his Skinnis extendis to

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Da
uid mar forspekar that Alexander gray and his clerk of the Schip sale
mak William Smitht be pait of ane pety quartar of salt
siclik as vthiris nichbouris of that rais' was pait and gif ony
vthiris pait pait him fee he sal pay siclik

the saide day the balyeis assignit Wednisday that next cumis
to Williame Wormet to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit
one him be michaele of ghenes franchman for the wrang
wys' haldin fra him of alevin frankis and demi

The saide day michael of ghenes grantit him avand to michel
nobile iiijor frankis eftir the tenor' of his hand writ

The said day the balyeis assignit Wednisday that next cumis to
William Wormet to ansuer' to the borghe' Strekit one him
be gilbert menyeis forspekar ofor michel of ghenes for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of his part of iiijor frankis and for the
relevinge of the said' michelis obligacion

The saide day Dauid Steuarte grantit to gif his band and obli
gacion to Dauid thomas' mar' to freithe and releywe him of frankis
for the quhilkis he is bundin for him in franche

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij
octauo die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day thomas mar' grantit that Williame blinsel is
avand' to him and Androw branche apone his lande xxvj li'
and mar' eftir the tenor' of his Reuersione maid to the saide William
tharapone obefor' Ande Alexander rede forspekar to the saide William
warnit and requerit Thomas mar' personalie present in the said court
to comper this day xv dais to resaue pament of the somes
content in the saide reuersione eftir the tenor' of the samyn

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to John
moir' to ansuer perempturlie to the borghe strekit one him be Johne
Alexander talyour' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of x s' with consent
of bath the partiis

the saide day It sere Jonhne ruthirfurd' falyeit in the Entiringe of Androw
cantlie befor the balyeis to ansuer' for the dissobeinge of John men
yeis in the haldinge of his taxt tharfor thai ordanit
sergeand' to tak ane distres' of the said' knichtis and lat it agan
to borghe and warne him to Entir the saide Androw this day xv
dais et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Julij quo supra

The saide day philp quhithede Elene heruy his Spous'
grantit thame thankfullie pait in novmirit gold and Siluer
be the handis of thomas Waus' procurator to gilbert menyeis for thar
part of the landis and annuellis Rentis liand in the gallougate
bocht fra thame be the said gilbert' and dischargit and quietecla
mauitquietclamit the said gilbert his ayris executouris and assignais for tham thar
ayris executouris assignais now and foreuire

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem v 3o
die Augusti anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quinto

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv days to
Richerd' hil yongar to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him
be Johne of Kyntor for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of iij s' as dettouris for Willekin Skippar

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday next to Cum to William
lammyntone to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be Androw lammynton'
that he fulfillit nocht his bill of rekning anent the selling of iijc skinnis
and demi flemys demi barrel Salmond' and demi barrel girls'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
eiusdem Septimo die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

the saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dayis to Jonhne
Waus in futy to preyve lauchfullie befor thame In the tolbutht
of Abirdene that the Custummaris of banff had arestit ane barrell
of Salmond pertening to Johne of Cullane quhilkis he deliuerit
to him to bring' about to Abirdene Ande gif the said Johne
falyeis in his preyve to ansuer' the said day to the borghe' strekit
one him be the saide Johne of Cullan as day of peremptour'

The saide day Jonhe litstar gravntit him avand to thomas
prat fourtene pundis Scottis money quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Jonhne moir' grantit him to pay tene s' Scottis
money to Alexander talyour' betuix this and mertymis next
to Cum

The saide day Jonhne Waus in futy conuictit and in ane Amerciament
of the court be ane Suorne assis' Alexander chamer forspekar
for the strubulance of thomas scot' and als' for the strubulance
of his wyff and to amend to thame as law wile and
forber' in tyme to cum for the quhilkis amendis to be maid'
bath the said partiis was oblist be thar handis vphaldin
to stand and abid at the deliuerance and ordinance of the saide
assis' quhilkis riplie avisit the richtis resonnis and allega
cionis of batht the said partiis harde seyne and vndirstandyn
deliuerit and ordanit the saide Jonhne be virteu of his fathtis
and oblisinge to pay tene s' to the saide thomas for the skathis
Sustenit be him throw the hurtinge of his persone and tene
s' to Jonhne Sanclar' for his lechinge Ande he sale
bringe hayme j boytfull of Stanys to Sanct
nicholes for the offens' committit to the tone and fra
towe for the quhilkis he sele haue xiij s' and iiij d'
fra the mastir of Sanct nicholes werk eftir the
hayme bringyne of the stanys

The saide day Alexander Stabillar conuicit be ane Suorne
assis' William blinsel forspekar for the strubulance of Will
gray talyour' and to amend as law will et cetera and the said
William fand William Kintor law borghe' that the saide
Alexander sal be vnstrubulit be him and his party bot as law wile
and the saide Alexander fand mathou branche law borghe' for him
that the saide William salbe Skathles for him and his party bot
as law will And Ilkan of the said partiis ar oblist
to freithe thar borrowis and keipe tham skathles heranent

The saide the balyeis assignit the aucht day of this
Instant of August to Williame goldsmyth to ansuer to
the borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne' of meldrum for the
wranguis' halding' fra him of fywe pundis scottis
money

The saide day Jonhne of meldrum gravntit him avand to sere
Jonhne ruthirfurd fywe pundis Scottis money

The saide day William lammyntone lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borghe' Strekit one him be William lammyntone that
he fulfillit nocht his bill send with him nor yeit his bile of rek
ning anent the sellinge of iijc skinnis and demi flemys / demi ane barrel of Salmond'
and demi barrel of girls' tharfor the balyeis ordanit thomas henry orvm
sergeand' to pas' and tak ane Stres' fra the saide William and lat it
agan to borghe and It be be askit and warne him to comper one
tuysday as secund' day of proces'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
Augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die thomas Kenyeoche in Amerciamento Curie pro perturbio Alexandri
ryne Ac pro perturbio burgi quibus emendabit ut iura volunt

Eodem die Willelmus lammyntone in Amerciamento Curie per assisam ex
ore Alexandri rede prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Willelmi Cardnow
Et Idem Willelmus cardnow pro perturbio dicti Willelmi et quilibet
alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
d'd' overwrites 'vn' or 'vi'.ecimo die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day It was Statut' and ordanit be the consal that the
baxtaris sale baik tua penny breide contening xxxvj vncez of
gude clene weile bakin breide fresche Stuff for ij d' and xvjj d' xviij
vnce for j d' and ix vnce for ane ob' vndir the payne of
law ale gude Stuffis

The saide day thomas Sadlar' in ane amerciament of the court be his
tonge graunt for the wranguis' brekinge of the yard yet
of Sanct thomas hospitale and hevin of ane apile tre and to
Amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum

The saide day Wat atkin grantit him aving thre stanys off
woll to the wif of Jonhne ramsay tharof j Stane to pay
within xv dais and the price of the tothir ij stane in money
as woll gevis in the tone
